i am very skinny and energetic.

i love tacos but hate spaghetti.
i could not live without my dog , bart.

I am widowed.

content.text: Good! I love my job, but I'm not as close to my family as I'd like to be.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm not happy with my weight, but I'm enjoying my creative outlet and getting in touch with my body and mind.
That's great to hear! What do you do for a creative outlet?
I'm a painter and I'm starting to get into writing poetry.
Wow, that's really cool! I love to paint as well. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
Me neither! But it's so therapeutic. What kind of paintings do you do?
I mainly do landscapes and portraits.
My dad is a really good painter, but he's not very creative. He just paints pictures of what he sees.
That's still really cool! I wish I could paint like that.
You should give it a try! You might surprise yourself.
I might! I've always been too afraid to try.
Well, don't be! I'm sure you'd be great at it
